text:
1. Open eye shadow palette
2. Select desired eye shadow color
3. Dip brush into eye shadow
4. Tap off excess eye shadow
5. Apply eye shadow to eyelid
6. Blend eye shadow using brush
7. Repeat steps 2-6 for other eye shadow colors
8. Open mascara tube
9. Remove mascara wand from tube
10. Position mascara wand at the base of upper lashes
11. Wiggle wand back and forth to apply mascara
12. Repeat steps 10-11 for lower lashes
13. Open eyeliner pencil
14. Hold eyeliner pencil at an angle
15. Draw a thin line along the upper lash line
16. Extend the line slightly past the outer corner of the eye
17. Repeat steps 14-16 for lower lash line
18. Curl eyelashes using an eyelash curler (optional)
19. Apply false eyelashes (optional)
20. Apply eyebrow pencil or powder to fill in eyebrows (optional)
21. Apply eye primer to ensure longer-lasting eye makeup (optional)
22. Set eye makeup with setting spray (optional)
